overview: Follow the men of the P.J. in their hunt for the formidable dealer Nicolas Brasse. An infernal pursuit that mixes corruption, slippage, abuse of power and of course ... depravity, both on the side of the cailleras than among the keufs! 142 minutes of sultry scene and 7 intense gay porn scenes, filmed like never before. Indic is more than a porn, it's a real French movie!
title: BaXstage
